name: Arty and the Plant
description:
***WARNING: HTML VERSION LAGS WHEN YOU START THE GAME BETTER DOWNLOAD***

My submission for Ludum Dare #46

This game is about a single robot searching for a suitable spot to plant a plant in this desolate land.

Objective:

  • Find the Waterfall

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Q to Hide Plant
  • E to Water Plant
  • R to Restart( If Stuck)
